General.Name: Cypark Resources Berhad
General.Description: Cypark Resources Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the renewable energy, construction and engineering, greentech and environment, and waste management and waste-to-energy (WTE) businesses in Malaysia. It offers environmental engineering and integrated turnkey contract, management, and planning and design services; and specialist maintenance works on leachate treatment plants, biogas and biomass activities, and other related specialist or consultancy works. The company also provides landscape, project management, civil and structural works, and infrastructure development services; and environment and landscape maintenance services. In addition, it is involved in the solar business; and operation of waste management facilities. Cypark Resources Berhad was founded in 1999 and is based in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
